item.description:
Date: Saturday, June 25, 2010

Time:12:30 pm - 6pm

Place: Arsenal Park 485 Arsenal St. Watertown, MA 02472

Cost: $12 (if you rsvp by Thursday June 23rd by 10pm)

$15 (if late rsvp or walk in)

Pay at the picnic registration table.

Join us for our 3rd annual picnic/bbq. This is our biggest event of the year and we hope you can make it. We have rented a covered picnic area (tables 11, 12, 13). Come and meet other meetup members and have some fun. The park also has tennis and basketball courts nearby and we will set up a badminton net on the playing field. Bring a frisbee, lawn chair and/or picnic blanket and join us for a good time. [:)]

We will be serving a delicious bbq:

1/4 lb burgers, hot dogs, kielbasa lemongrass chicken wings, fish balls grilled, vegetable kabobs, vietnamese fresh spring rolls, potato & pasta salads, fresh fruit salad, watermelon, ice cold drinks.

There is free parking at the park and the nearby mall. If you need a ride, please note that in your rsvp and someone may be able to give you a ride. You can take the bus to the park as well. If you can provide a ride, please note that. 

By MBTA Bus - The 70 and 70A buses stop on Arsenal Street, not too far from Arsenal Park. (There are other bus lines that stop a few blocks away, such as the 86 and 64.) Please visit http://mbta.com to plan your trip.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for covered picnic area near the water fountain- Picnic tables 11, 12, 13

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Picnic/BBQ
